| ------------ |

Note: In this context, "mobility" is a material property. Other entities in the paragraph, such as "PCDSeBT", "pristine PCDTBT", and the numerical value "5.1 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s", are also material properties or specific values of material properties.
